p: To test the influence of evolutionary history on range shifts induced by climate warming, we did χ 2 tests on ΔS, u alt, u lon and u lat during the LGM to current and current to future between each sister species pair and between two clades (G clade1 and G clade2). Additionally, χ 2 tests were used to compare G mon and G dio, as well as between groups pairs from G QTP, G HM, G plain and G wide to examine the effects of breeding systems and ecological niche differentiation on the response to climate change. These analyses were performed using SPSS Statistics ver. 22.
